exercises.title: Warm Welcome
exercises.text: Thanks for reaching out. I understand the issue, and I’m happy to help.

exercises.title: Clarify Device
exercises.text: To confirm, are you seeing this on both mobile and desktop?

exercises.title: Next Step
exercises.text: Please try to restart the device and retry the login. This often resolves the problem.

exercises.title: Request Details
exercises.text: Could you share the exact screenshot and the time it happened? A screenshot helps, if available.

exercises.title: Set Expectations
exercises.text: I’m escalating this to our engineering team. We’ll follow up within one business day.

exercises.title: Policy Tone
exercises.text: For security reasons, we can’t make account changes without verification. Please use the link we sent to confirm ownership.
